data.persona: I was once dead.  I have come to life. I am feared by children.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to church.
The entrance to the church can only be described as a bit scary.  It is overgrown with mosses and weeds.  It has not been taken care of and is a mixture of wood and stone.  It is dirty, and things live here.
There's a moss, a statue, a Gravestone, a weed, and a ghost here.
The ghost and the trolls are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a flannel shirt.

data.short_motivation: I want to scare the ghost away.
data.mid_motivation: I want to scare away everyone who comes to the church.
data.long_motivation: I want to make the church my permanent home.
